This guide is a simplified overview of all the changes in the [[Redstone Update]] ({{JE}} 1.5.x releases), which assumes at least some familiarity with the [[Pretty Scary Update]] (''Java Edition'' 1.4.x releases).

== Mobs ==
=== Changed ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|Changed Mobs}} 
|-
|All mobs
|
|No longer walk over rails unless they are pursuing the player.
|-
|[[Skeleton]]s 
|[[File:Skeleton JE4 BE2.png|128px]]
|
* Now shoot from 15 blocks away, instead of 10.
* Now shoot faster when their target is close, depending on difficulty.
|-
|[[Slime]]s 
|[[File:Slime JE2 BE1.png|128px]]
|Spawn rates in swamps now depend on the current moon phase.
|-
|[[Zombie]]s
|[[File:Zombie JE2 BE1.png|128px]]
|
* Now group up on targets.
* They can now set players on fire when on fire themselves.
* Increased zombies attack damage.
* Increased player detection range.
|}

=== Changed ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|Changed Blocks}} 
|-
|[[Beacon]] 
|[[File:Beacon JE4 BE1.png|84px]]
|Increased effect radius from 16/24/32/40 blocks to 20/30/40/50 blocks.
|-
|[[Brewing stand]], [[chest]], [[detector rail]] and [[jukebox]] 
|{{Animate|Brewing Stand (empty) JE1 BE1.png;Chest.png;Detector Rail (NS) JE1 BE1.png;Jukebox JE1 BE1.png|84px}}
|Now emit a redstone signal into an adjacent comparator. Signal strength depends on the fullness of the block.
|-
|[[Dispenser]] 
|[[File:Dispenser (S) JE2 BE1.png|84px]]
|
* Now equip armor to players that are up to 1 block away.
* Can place and activate TNT.
* Now use bone meal on a crop or sapling in front of them.
* Can create fire in front of them with flint and steel, which consumes durability.
* They can now face all 6 directions and use a different texture when facing up or down.
* No longer fire while updated, instead they fire when their input becomes powered.
* Now emits a redstone signal into an adjacent comparator. Signal strength depends on the fullness of the dispenser.
|-
|[[Lava]] 
|[[File:Lava.png|84px]]
|
* Flows faster in the Nether.
* Updated texture.
|-
|[[Nether Bricks|Nether brick]] block <!-- had singular name back then -->
|[[File:Nether Bricks JE1 BE1.png|84px]]
|Now has a crafting recipe of 4 [[Nether brick]] items.
|}

== Items ==
=== New ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|New Items}} 
|-
|[[Nether brick]] (item)
|[[File:Nether Brick JE1 BE1.png|84px]]
|
{{Smelting|Netherrack|Nether Brick}} 
|Can be used to make [[Nether Bricks|Nether brick]] blocks.
|-
|[[Nether quartz]]
|[[File:Nether Quartz JE1 BE1.png|84px]]
|Is now dropped from [[Nether quartz ore]].
|
* Is a crafting ingredient for [[daylight sensor]]s and [[redstone comparators]].
* Can be crafted into building blocks.
|}

=== Changed ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|Changed Items}}
|-
|[[Bone meal]]
|[[File:Bone Meal JE2 BE2.png|84px]]
|
* Now picks a random stage of growth each time, as opposed to automatically pushing them to the final growth stage.
* Saplings take 2–4 bone meal to sprout into a tree.
* Gives off green particles when used.
|}

== Non-mob entities ==
=== New ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|New Non-mob entities}} 
|-
|[[Minecart with hopper]] 
|[[File:Minecart with Hopper JE1 BE1.png|84px]]
|
{{Crafting
|B2= Hopper
|B3= Minecart
|Output= Minecart with Hopper
}}
|{{Drop|Item|Minecart with Hopper}} 
|
* Can only be emptied by passing over a hopper.
* Can pick up items from containers when it passes under them.
|-
|[[Minecart with TNT]] 
|[[File:Minecart with TNT JE1 BE1.png|84px]]
|
{{Crafting
|B2= TNT
|B3= Minecart
|Output= Minecart with TNT
}}
|{{Drop|Item|Minecart with TNT}}
|
* Gets triggered by activator rails.
* Explodes more violently the faster it goes.
* Doesn't destroy rails, supporting blocks or redstone materials.
|-
|[[Minecart with spawner]]
|[[File:Minecart with Spawner JE1.png|84px]]
|Can only be spawned in through commands.
|{{Drop|Item|Minecart}}
|Functions the same as a spawner, but can move like a minecart.
|}
